job.title: Affinity Group Data Analyst
job.description: ltstronggtltugtDescriptionltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtAt First Republic we care about our people We offer extraordinary client service in private banking private business banking and private wealth management Founded in 1985 we believe that personal connections are everything and our success is driven by the relationships we form with our colleagues and clients Youll always feel empowered and valued at First RepublicltbrgtltbrgtIncredible teams doing exceptional work everydayltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtResponsibilitiesltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtThe primary function of the Affinity Group Data Analyst is to provide support data management and reporting to the various verticals and management teams of the Financial Executives Alliance FEAltbrgtltbrgtWhat youll be doing as a Affinity Group Data Analystltbrgtltulgtltligt Maintain and update internal FEA CRM system  validateupdate information check existence of firm and customerltligtltligt Review daily Term Sheet enewsletter and add missing firms from database to CRM systemltligtltligt Research and validate new members  conduct due diligence on membership applicationsltligtltligt For new members who have been validated  update online profiles and add them to their appropriate Elistsltligtltligt Research bounce back email addresses and update profiles if uncover new contact information Create and send list to FEA management for unresolvedltligtltligt Conduct various internet research projects as directed  searching for members on LinkedInltligtltligt Follow up on firmsindividuals who weve lost track ofltbrgtltligtltulgtReportingltbrgtltulgtltligt Send weekly report of new members to FEA Managementltligtltligt Compile and distribute monthly banker business prospecting reportltligtltligt Pull quarterly new business report leveraging internal reporting systemltbrgtltligtltulgtWebsite ampamp Eventsltbrgtltulgtltligt Maintain website content including  approved articles webinars refresh job board board memberltligtltligt Potentially assist FEA Marketing Associate with event confirmation emails and phone calls to membershipltligtltligt Maintain and update Master RSVP tracking reportltligtltligt Provide support on any IT issuesltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtQualificationsltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtYou could be a great fit if you haveltbrgtltulgtltligt Mastery of personal computers in a Windowsbased environment including Microsoft Office Suite and Outlook especially data management and Excel reportingltligtltligt Preferred experience with basic html coding and especially SQL but not requiredltligtltligt Excellent attention to detail and high degree of accuracy and consistencyltligtltligt Excellent organizational communication skills whether interaction is in person over the telephone or via emailltligtltligt Excellent customer service skillsltligtltligt Preferred familiarity with the Alternative Investment Industry but not requiredltligtltligt Will be required to multitask on a daily basis due to fast paced business environment and demandltligtltligt Maintain productive and upbeat attitude within high pressured environmentltligtltligt Ability to work independently prioritize and selfstart projects under minimal supervisionltligtltligt BSBA degree or equivalent experience preferredltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtJob Demandsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligt Must be able to review and analyze data reports and manuals must be computer proficientltligtltligt Must be able to communicate effectively via telephone and in personltbrgtltligtltulgtOwn your work and your career  apply nowltbrgtltbrgtAre you willing to take initiative and make decisions Are you willing to go the extra mile because you love what you do and how you can contribute as a team Do you want the freedom to grow and the opportunity to take charge of your own career If so then come join usltbrgtltbrgtWe want hard working team players Youll have the independence to learn lead and drive change A culture of extraordinary service empowerment and stability  thats the First Republic way Come join usltbrgtltbrgtThis job description is not intended to be allinclusive Employee may perform other related duties as assigned to meet the ongoing needs of the organization The Company is an equal opportunity employer In this regard the Company makes reasonable accommodations for qualified applicants and employees with disabilities in order to enable them to perform all essential job functions unless doing so creates an undue hardshipltbrgtltbrgtFirst Republic is subject to federal laws that restrict the employment of individuals with certain types of criminal histories including FDIA Section 19 and FINRA To the extent not inconsistent with our obligations under those federal laws and regulations First Republic will consider qualified candidates with criminal histories in a manner consistent with the Los Angeles and San Francisco banthebox laws
